title: Pset_BoilerPHistory
description:
Boiler performance history common attributes.
WaterQuality attribute deleted in IFC2x2 Pset Addendum: Use IfcWaterProperties instead. CombustionProductsMaximulLoad and CombustionProductsPartialLoad attributes deleted in IFC2x2 Pset Addendum: Use IfcProductsOfCombustionProperties instead.

OperationalEfficiency.title: OperationalEfficiency
OperationalEfficiency.description: Operational efficiency: boiler output divided by total energy input (electrical and fuel).

PartLoadRatio.title: PartLoadRatio
PartLoadRatio.description: Ratio of the real to the nominal capacity.

PrimaryEnergyConsumption.title: PrimaryEnergyConsumption
PrimaryEnergyConsumption.description: Boiler primary energy source consumption (i.e., the fuel consumed for changing the thermodynamic state of the fluid).

AuxiliaryEnergyConsumption.title: AuxiliaryEnergyConsumption
AuxiliaryEnergyConsumption.description: Boiler secondary energy source consumption (i.e., the electricity consumed by electrical devices such as fans and pumps).
